text: Uttam Rai (born 20 December 1996) is an Indian professional footballer who plays as a forward. He previously appeared with both the Nepali Martyr's Memorial A-Division League clubs Friends Kopundole and Sankata Boys.UTTAM RAI: ON A GOALSCORING RUN IN NEPAL . Sikkim Express. Retrieved 10 September 2021. == References == Category:1996 births Category:Indian footballers Category:Living people
title: Uttam Rai
